tasks.instruction: Say the individual sounds you hear in the word 'lamp'.
Blend these sounds together to say the word: /s/ /t/ /o/ /p/
Read this word aloud quickly: people
Read this sentence aloud: The little dog ran quickly to the park.
tasks.expected: The little dog ran quickly to the park.

tasks.instruction: Listen carefully and type the word you hear.
Listen carefully and type the sentence you hear.
tasks.ttsText: We went to the beach yesterday.
tasks.expected: We went to the beach yesterday.

tasks.instruction: Name these common objects as fast as you can: car, house, star, tree, ball
Name these letters as fast as you can: P, G, B, T, K
Read the following and answer the question: 'Tom found a lost kitten in his garden. It was small and gray.' Question: Where did Tom find the kitten?
